TITLE: Strategy North Star Sales and Marketing Master Document

NorthStar Sales and Marketing Master
Document

1. Introduction
NorthStar Group builds trust by offering real value to partners before asking for
commitments. Our approach is simple: enrich and empower others first. This philosophy is
central to every product and service we provide. By focusing on benefits to our partners and
communities, we create lasting relationships that lead to mutual success.

2. Core Principles
2.1 Provide useful tools and resources for free or low cost to build trust.
2.2 Focus on practical benefits that partners can use immediately.
2.3 Use clear, simple language in all communications.
2.4 Avoid overpromising; deliver on commitments with precision.
2.5 Build relationships through reciprocity and mutual gain.

3. Strategic Focus Areas
3.1 Public Housing Authority Engagement
We offer PHAs a pathway to increase cash flow through development fees and efficient
building methods such as Structural Insulated Panels (SIPs). Our program enables PHAs to
expand housing capacity while maintaining long-term ownership.
Key Offer: Development fee income and supercharged cash flow through high-efficiency
housing builds.
Supporting Tools: Optional mapping tool for community garden planning.
Tactics: Direct outreach to target list of top PHAs with decision-maker contact details.
3.2 Edible Rain Gardens
Our edible rain gardens address two critical needs: stormwater management and food
insecurity. We locate ideal sites using mapping technology and install gardens that produce
food while controlling runoff.
Key Offer: Affordable, scalable rain garden designs with community training.

Tactics: Position as a public benefit program that improves local food access and
infrastructure resilience.
